ygData.subject: Re: NEAT for PacMan

Has anyone actually gotten the Ms. Pacman stuff that they distributed
to wo=
rk?  From what I can tell, they used the Microsoft Revenge of the
Arcade pa=
ckage (which isn't free) but they say you can download a demo
and use that.=
...but the demo only contains regular Pacman, and the
dimensions that the s=
creen scraper expects the window to be in aren't
feasible with the demo.

-=
-Wesley
